title: nI iruppadO tiru
sahitya:
nI iruppadO tiruttaNigai enrum nAn tudippadum unadu rEkhai arul tarum murugA


anupallavi

  Ayiram sonnAlum Arumukhattukk-iNai akhilattil ellai illai arumarai poruLum sharavaNabhavanE


caraNam    vENDi tinai mAvum tinrAi perum vEngai maramAgi ninrAi �vana
vaLLi mayilALai venrAi E manaduLLE tulangiDuvAi turiyam aruLum shiva guruparanE pita
			(underlined words are in madhyamakAla)
